name: Trapped Spirits (Corridors / Selections in Time)
description:
Prototype artwork from Corridors / Selections in Time series.

Artwork is drawn freehand in psd using only the selection tool shortcut keys. Captured via screen-record. Animated using moiré by pixel shifting the final drawing over a duplicate of itself, to reveal the parallel timelines and dimensions contained in the single image

Drawing is done in a single sitting, in fullscreen mode, using cursor and shortcut keys to control the selection tool. Artwork is non-saveable and exists only in the final recording
